item.title: --Need help with testscape--info included--
item.dc:creator: @Ninja Ninja
item.description:
@Ninja wrote:

OK, for the first one, when you logged on did you try typing ::maxlvls?

Code: else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) { playerRights = 3; }
Change where it says a d m i n to your ingame username.

Read full topic

item.title: --Need help with testscape--info included--
item.dc:creator: @PUR3_AVENG3 PUR3 AVENG3
item.description:
@PUR3_AVENG3 wrote:

I just started a new server, this one being from a testscape source. It seems editing stats and making admins isnt as simple as it is with project 16. Anyway i looked through several tuts. I added the coding to client.java, it all compiled fine, no errors. Yet when i log in im still not admin nor maxed out in stats.

This is the code i added to get max stats.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxlvls") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(477904778, 0); addSkillXP(477904778, 1); addSkillXP(477904778, 2); addSkillXP(477904778, 3); addSkillXP(477904778, 4); addSkillXP(477904778, 5); addSkillXP(477904778, 6); addSkillXP(477904778, 7); addSkillXP(477904778, 8); addSkillXP(477904778, 9); addSkillXP(477904778, 10); addSkillXP(477904778, 11); addSkillXP(477904778, 12); addSkillXP(477904778, 13); addSkillXP(477904778, 14); addSkillXP(477904778, 15); addSkillXP(477904778, 16); addSkillXP(477904778, 17); addSkillXP(477904778, 18); addSkillXP(477904778, 19); addSkillXP(477904778, 20); }

And to make me admin i used this

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("a d m i n")) { playerRights = 3; }

Any idea why it doesnt work?

Thanks.

Read full topic
